name: @clairelizbet/copy-to-clipboard
description: A perfectly cromulent copy to clipboard script

scripts.build: playwright install --with-deps && npm run compile-minified && npm run gzip && npm run link
scripts.link: npm link && cd test/pkg && npm link @clairelizbet/copy-to-clipboard
scripts.test: npm run link && concurrently -s "command-1" -k --kill-signal SIGKILL "npm:start:server" "playwright test"

author: claire (https://github.com/clairelizbet)
